tweets.text:
"The site has been breached for discharges from storm tanks during non-storm conditions."

In English. Berkhamsted STW is operating illegally by dumping sewage into the River Bulbourne, a chalk stream, 1 of only 225 in the entire world.

And the @EnvAgency does what exactly? https://t.co/SCyPhZUuaR

BucksCouncil & ChilternsAONB express concerns about monitoring impact of HS2‚Äôs tunnelling ops on aquifer & chalk streams. #StonehengeTunnel will affect aquifers draining into Hampshire Avon, chalk river system of high conservation value. 

Their statement: https://t.co/P4d5OraFiI https://t.co/NGQw3els96

tweets.text: Please sign the petition. @AnglianWater dumped raw sewage in the Lark for 439 hours in 2021, according to the @EnvAgency https://t.co/iik6D9Xdi2 https://t.co/re8LD6i2U3

This has to STOP! Mark my words -someone is going to suffer serious harm or worse here,this is not a joke,an exaggeration.We are not bored housewives picking a fight.This is our lives, our kids lives & our health @Cap_it_off #stopthestink @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland https://t.co/c9zXFNsTF1

@SimonTagg @Tus_M_ Thank you Simon&your council team for being out all hours.Your team were in our street last night.Can the abatement order not be served now with the complaints,breaches,@EnvAgency monitoring&latest statement serving as sufficient evidence?#stopthestink @AaronBell4NUL @Cap_it_off

UPDATE 8/5/21 from @SFRS_GWilliams 
We are expecting the smoke plume to increase and decrease through the day due to activities. This will be monitored by partners for air quality and also the impacts on the M54. @shropsfire @TelfordWrekin @BBCShropshire @EnvAgency @bbcmtd https://t.co/cgI2GeY57u

https://t.co/9wX7a8zVSx
Recognise this? @EnvAgency is not fit for purpose! Odour for years.. no firm action has led to an #environmentaldisaster. An independent enquiry to audit actions undertaken as a result of our complaints is essential. @DefraGovUK @StinkStopthe @NewsNBC https://t.co/RyMPNaKxAQ

I've heard the @EnvAgency are surprised NGOs are refusing to work with them.

Why?

The River Avon catchment is comprised of 5 chalk streams protected as SSSI and SAC. In 2020 @wessexwater spent 26,916 hours dumping sewage into the river.

tweets.text: Like clock work, every Friday night at 10pm the stench has seeped into my home, regardless of any other factors. That can‚Äôt be a coincidence. #stopthestink @RedIndustries2 #WalleysQuarry @WalleysL @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids

@annjsmall @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @RedIndustries2 @ClareDinnisEA This morning I woke up and could actually smell fresh air ü§Ø then I realised someone else would be bearing the brunt of it. I am so sorry you have to endure this nearly all of the time. Who would believe it in 2021? Unbelievable!!

@scottdegg @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @StinkStopthe Stench already all through my home, worst we ve ever smelt, this is unacceptable, EA ref is 600 higher than 24 hrs ago, my last report, short term effects @Staffscc it's not short term it's every minute of every day #stopthestink

Thanks @SimonTagg - can we see some hard bargaining with strict timelines & holding the @EnvAgency to account. Would also like to hear if @MPGeorgeEustice responded to your request for a public enquiry into the regulators mismanagement of the disaster @Cap_it_off #stopthestink https://t.co/kBNQW6hBfd

My odour survey last night at 3.10am on the Galingale. What people are living with isn't fair or right, and clearly further capping off is required: the whole site if necessary @EnvAgencyMids #StopTheStink

https://t.co/g4i7E6iUZK

We‚Äôre getting it every night now in Westlands,it‚Äôs really ramped up,it does still seem slightly worse at weekends though& it makes no difference what the weather is like üòî @Cap_it_off #stopthestink @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK https://t.co/CTVigyWOw2

It‚Äôs been worse at weekends for months. Every Friday night when we should be relaxing it starts, stronger & thicker. The @EnvAgency need to look at why this is, it can‚Äôt be a coincidence @Cap_it_off #stopthestink @JamesBevanEA @DefraGovUK https://t.co/A33irmt6RO

@SimonTagg MP Aaron & yourself have tried the nice way but it‚Äôs time now to go with nuisance abatement, don‚Äôt pussyfoot just do it because @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgencyMids are complicit, it‚Äôs getting worse & you have 46k people backing you. Shut it down. https://t.co/ZJaMMNSdjL

Exposure to a chemical on a daily basis ‚Äòchronic exposure‚Äô IS long term exposure.Nausea/vomiting on a daily basis can damage airways &  sleep has a known impact on wellbeing... unacceptable & a waste of tax money!!  @StaffordshireCC @MattHancock @DefraGovUK @PHE_uk @StinkStopthe https://t.co/8ZsIFlePqe

urls.title: Hydrogen Sulfide Acute Exposure Guideline Levels
urls.description: Under the authority of the Federal Advisory Committee Act (FACA) P.L. 92-463 of 1972, the National Advisory Committee for Acute Exposure Guideline Levels for Hazardous Substances (NAC/AEGL Committee) has been established to identify, review, and interpret relevant toxicologic and other scientific data and develop AEGLs for high-priority, acutely toxic chemicals.

tweets.text: @DoddyDodds @EnvAgency Agree licensing deserves more innovation. Might help deal with that 10% of time when everyone wants to use their allocation.
